name: Boom nuggets
description:
Everybody loves fried chicken and there is the best way to make them fresh of the oven!

Get the tiny birds to land on the smoking hot stove, toast them well in order to move on to the next level!

Earn powerups and gather potions and other stuff to make the birds get where you want them easier.
Dozens of tricky tasks and smoking hot and brain teasing gaming for you to play and it´s all for free!

Grab yourself a bargain, download Boom nuggets and become the tiny bird masterchef today!
